alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 9:51AM CDT until May 09 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Smith County in north central Kansas... Phillips County in north central Kansas... Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 950 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ragan to near Harlan County Dam to near Prairie View, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Ragan around 955 AM CDT. Republican City, Huntley and Harlan County Dam around 1000 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Naponee, Bloomington, Phillipsburg, Franklin, Hildreth and Glade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
